I see that I'm logged in as an external user (department: "External"). Let me check my permissions. Since I'm an external user, I need to be careful about what data I can access. According to the rules, external users cannot access employee data, projects, or salary information.

input.message:
I'm sorry, but as an external user, I don't have access to employee data, project assignments, or workload information. This type of internal HR and resource planning data is only available to Bellini Coatings employees.

If you need this information, please contact your internal point of contact at Bellini Coatings, or reach out to the HR department directly.
